attributes.additional_details: The chaos engulfing the UK government is unprecedented. We have had 2 Prime Ministers resign in 2 month. Over 40 ministers resigned leaving departments without leadership during cost of living, energy and climate crises. War rages in Ukraine; the Northern Ireland Protocol has further damaged our relationship with Europe; recession looms; Scotland seeks independence. This is the greatest set of challenges we have seen in our lifetimes. Let the people decide who leads us through this turmoil.
attributes.background: After the resignation of 2 Prime Ministers in 2 months. We the people call for an immediate general election so that the people can decide who should lead us. Stop Britain becoming an international laughing stock.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
